long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Chrome App for Nooku is a quick way to test our powerful open source web application framework straight on our demo server.

Since Nooku is built for developers you can also find the source code of this Chrome App at github.com/nooku/nooku-chrome-app.

Follow us on twitter at http://twitter.com/nooku or check our website at http://www.nooku.org
